评论详情: I was pleasantly surprised at how well this fit. It is very soft and comfortable and the material is thick enough that my bra didn’t show through it. No transparency. The color is a true white and it lays nicely. It is very versatile in that you can wear it alone or with a vest or jacket over it. I will say it does run larger. I typically order a large because I don’t like a tight fit and I’m a little on the busty side. I had read in the reviews that it ran large so I ordered a medium and a large just to compare. I am sending the large back. The medium definitely fit easily. So, order a size down from what you typically wear. I really am pleased with this shirt.

评论概述: ANRABESS top with soft fabric and comfortable to wear
评论详情: I got this top for my wife in Blue Green color and medium size based on the size chart. She wears 34C and it fits her nicely and not too tight. The material is soft and it laundered well too. Perfect for any casual wear. Can be worn on jeans or khakis or dress pants. The sleeve design looks nice.

This shirt looks great and is comfortable to wear. I love the cap sleeve look. It seems well made- no loose threads or flaws. I wash it in cold water, hang dry, and then air fluff and it has held up well to multiple washes. Very happy with order- highly recommend.

This top looks great and fits just as well. It is super lightweight and comfortable, perfect for summer or warm spring/fall days. The material is soft and smooth with no loose threads, pilling, or loose seams found so far after a few wears. Holds up will in the wash and has gotten more comfortable. Great top at a reasonable price that I would recommend to anyone looking for a comfortable top that looks nice.
Such a pretty shirt. Easy to layer with sweaters or even a blazer for work. So much versatility. Fabric is soft with some stretch.
I’ve tried a few tops in a small and medium. This was a medium and I liked it! These tops are so incredibly soft, it like butter. I can’t wait to dress these up in the summer time!

Better than expected. Very cute-shirt. Size is True fit. Fabric feel good against your skin. fit very comfortable. Made well. Good room in the shoulders makes this blouse easy to move in. ATTRACTIVE. Good different style of a t-shirt. I AM HAPPY WITH THIS PRODUCT

ANRABESS Women Short Cap Sleeve Shirt Summer Casual Loose Fit Tops 2025 T-Shirts with Ribbed Cuff  Simple versatile top, can be worn casual with jeans or shorts, or dressed up paired with a skirt or dress pants and a cardigan or blazer. Just a basic shirt, but the cuff sleeves add a nice extra touch.
ordered in blue green and it is a beautiful color! but it is a bit looser, and the cuffed sleeves are thicker than I had expected, which feels weird on my arms.

This is a well-made top, in a lightweight material which is perfect for Florida weather.  I like my tops to fit loosely and ordered XL and it was perfect.  I ordered the blue and it was as pictured.  At this price point,  I would order again.

评论概述: Cute shirt at a great price
评论详情: This cute shirt is just right for a summer day. Light material, not tight, flattering. I like the length, the neckline being modest, and the style of the sleeves. The color is more green than the dark teal I was expecting, but I like it. The washing instructions are to wash cold and hang to dry. It could be casual or a little dressy. And a great price!

This shirt is very nice and is a great value. I received the color blue stripe. The colors were vibrant and pretty. I love the thick cuffs at the neckline and on the sleeves. The shirt seems to be of the highest quality and materials. With that said it is loose fitting so if you like your shirts to be more fitted size down 1 size. I normally wear a medium or large (depending on the brand) and I ordered a medium. This shirt is quite large on me. I should've ordered a small.

You know when you unbox and it’s even better than you pictured? That’s how I feel about this shirt. The color is perfect, the fabric feels soft and comfortable, the cut is flattering, and I really like it. The fit is a bit relaxed (I went off the size chart with my measurements), so if you want a snug fit, size down. I wore this the very day after I got it to a work Christmas event with Christmas jewelry, a nice cardigan, and some statement boots; it was an easy choice that looked great. It will easily work in the summer too, and I love it. 10/10 would recommend.

This shirt is cute but it comes off as a bargain store copycat.  The cut and styling are nice, but the material is super thin (every part and design of my bra showed thru clearly) and the seaming is very loosely sewn.  It is comfortable, will keep to wear around the house or over a bathing suit only.
This is a good quality shirt but I do not love the way it looks on me. It has kind of a boxy fit. I will wear this shirt around the house but it will not be among my favorites.

评论概述: Very soft and comfy except for the bottom of the sleeves
评论详情: The material of this t-shirt is extremely soft, comfortable, and drapes beautifully. It would have been a very comfy top to lounge in if not for the way the sleeves are stitched together under the pits. It almost feels like hard little knobs that poke at you every time you put your arms down. Honestly, it got kind of painful after a while. I’ve never felt anything like it. I wish the brand had just sewn the sleeves normally because it really impacts how long I can tolerate wearing this t-shirt.  It does fit well and true to size, and I found that the color was a good match for the product photos. Looks cute tucked into shorts or jeans.

I have been impressed with the Anrabess clothing and this simple white shirt was no exception.  It is a cap sleeve, not a tank with a "ruffled" sleeve, so be aware of that - the image in the listing is accurate.  The white is a tad bit see-through, but I got this to use as more of a layering piece, so that is not an issue for me.  I am 5'9" and typically wear a medium, and purchased a medium in this shirt and the fit it just right - not too tight and not too loose. Also, the length is great, it is not cropped at all.
I got this shirt for my daughter and she loves it. The material is comfortable and soft. It’s not too warm. It’s very flattering and fits perfectly.
This shirt feels nice! It looks cute in its simplicity. Since it’s hang to dry, it needs ironed. It’s easy to iron to though.
I love the slightly oversized fit. Its relaxed yet stylish, and its comfortable in the summer heat.

As always, Anrabess makes very good quality clothes. Great quality materials are used and beautifully made. I usually wear a medium but sized up because I like shirts a little loose, length is perfect and of course I got the beautiful blue.
